name: Midnight (itch) (Lord Dragoneye)
description:
Midnight is a savage platforming adventure... thing, sort of but not quite inspired by old castlevania games and those awful old platformer games that had you dying in one hit. It's hard, dude. But actually sort of fair. Also, i tried to find a way to use a lives system without it being a total waste of time, and i actually think i almost did a good job of it.

The funny thing is, i don't even know how it happened. Do you ever get that thing, where you have a sudden, unexplained burst of inspiration, and then the next thing you know, a week has passed and you have this thing that you don't know what to do with? No? Well i get that all the time. It's quite annoying, actually.

TL;DR

Really hard, fair(?) game that's like NES Castlevania if NES Castlevania wasn't all about killing things.

Oh, and BTW, if you're a total wuss who can't handle the old-school lives system, try inputting the konami code on the title screen. You whimp.

And one last thing; The sounds for Midnight's laugh and scream were made by a Freesound.com user called 11linda. https://freesound.org/people/1...
